author: Staff Reporter
text:
ACME Round Table has organised ‘Tiger Run 2016’ around Coimbatore Golf Course in Chettipalayam on February 21, Sunday.

Funds raised at the event will be used for projects to save the tiger.

Events

There will be two events - six kilometre and eleven kilometres for which the registration fees are Rs. 500 and Rs. 750 per person, respectively.

ACME Round Table is actively involved in conserving tigers by supporting the forest department and the community since 2009.

Registrations

For registrations and details on rules, prizes and route log on towww.saveatiger.inor emailacmetigerrun@gmail.com. Or register at RK Photo Centre in Race Course, ID in Brookefields Mall, Junior Kuppanna on Avinashi Road and at Upbeat in R.S. Puram.
title: A run to save tigers
